mapper.insert: insert in to baord_reply(rnum, bnum, reply, idx) values(seq_reply.nextval, #{bnum}, #{reply}, #{idx})
mapper.update: update board_reply set reply= #{reply}, updatedate = sysdate where rnum= #{rnum}
mapper.select: select rnum, bnum, reply, idx, replyDate, updatedate from board_reply where bnum = #{bnum} order by rnum asc
